about_the_game:
Imagine a vast and immersive world filled with fantastic creatures, legendary treasures, and dangerous foes. This is the setting of an open-world RPG fantasy game that places you in the role of a hero on a grand quest.

In this game, the focus is on quests, both large and small. Every NPC (non-player character) you meet has a story to tell, and each story leads to a new adventure. You might be asked to retrieve a stolen artefact, slay a dragon that's been terrorizing a village, or help a group of rebels overthrow an evil king. The possibilities are endless, and each quest has its own unique challenges and rewards.

It's a place of wonder and danger, where you'll encounter towering mountains, sprawling forests, and deep caverns filled with secrets. Everywhere you look, there are new sights to see, new creatures to battle, and new mysteries to unravel.

As you explore the world, you'll meet a diverse cast of characters, from wise sages to cunning thieves. Some will become your allies, offering their skills and resources to aid you on your quest. Others will be your enemies, seeking to thwart your progress at every turn.

Combat is a central element of the game, and you'll need to master a variety of weapons and spells to survive the dangers of the world. Whether you prefer to charge into battle with a sword and shield or rain down fire from a distance, the game offers a range of playstyles to suit your preferences.

In addition to quests and combat, the game also features a robust crafting system. You'll be able to gather materials from the environment and use them to create powerful weapons, armor, and other items to aid you on your journey.

Overall, this is a game that places a strong emphasis on storytelling and exploration, set in a visually stunning world with rich lore and compelling characters. It's a game that will challenge you, thrill you, and keep you coming back for more as you explore its many secrets and discover your destiny as a hero... or a nobody.

name: Lakatos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel 7th generation or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080 (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Not sure yet
  • VR Support: Just keyboard

short_description: Lakatos is an open-world RPG fantasy game focused on magical quests. Explore a beautifully crafted world filled with diverse characters, challenging combat, and rewarding crafting systems. Take on quests both big and small as you unravel a grand adventure in a world filled with wonder and danger.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
